item.title: Just a lil command help please. [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

c.gfx(GFX ID);

if that doesn’t work properly, try this:

c.gfx0(GFX ID);

item.title: Just a lil command help please. [pi]
item.dc:creator: @patargangstar patargangstar
item.description:
@patargangstar wrote:

ok so basically

for example

i want to find out how to incorporate gfx into a command

so like

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("afk")) { c.startAnimation(1353); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
instead of the animation how would i make the command perform a gfx? like c.startGfx(608); in the place of c.startAnimations didnt work

Read full topic
